item.title: Get a Consumer Advocate On Your Side
item.description:
While we often think of consumer advocates as helping individuals, businesses can benefit from them too. After all, businesses are consumers too! They buy products and services just like people do. But when a business needs to purchase from a much larger company, it can be challenging to negotiate a fair deal. This is especially true in the telecommunications industry. A mid-size business trying to negotiate with a telecom giant is at a disadvantage...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/get-a-consumer-advocate-on-your-side/
